lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador won the eighth stage of the Tour de Suisse, and his fellow Spaniard Koldo Gil Perez retained the overall lead. Contador traveled the 103-mile course, starting and ending in Ambri, Switzerland, in 4 hours 19 minutes 3 seconds.
